 27 #include "config.h"
 28 #include "DOMCacheEngine.h"
 29 
 30 #include "CacheQueryOptions.h"
 31 #include "Exception.h"
 32 #include "HTTPParsers.h"

 33 
 34 namespace WebCore {
 35 
 36 namespace DOMCacheEngine {
 37 
 38 static inline Exception errorToException(Error error)
 39 {
 40     switch (error) {
 41     case Error::NotImplemented:
 42         return Exception { NotSupportedError, "Not implemented"_s };
 43     case Error::ReadDisk:
 44         return Exception { TypeError, "Failed reading data from the file system"_s };
 45     case Error::WriteDisk:
 46         return Exception { TypeError, "Failed writing data to the file system"_s };
 47     case Error::QuotaExceeded:
 48         return Exception { QuotaExceededError, "Quota exceeded"_s };
 49     case Error::Internal:
 50         return Exception { TypeError, "Internal error"_s };
 51     default:
 52         ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
 53         return Exception { TypeError, "Connection stopped"_s };
 54     }


 55 }
 56 
 57 Exception convertToExceptionAndLog(ScriptExecutionContext* context, Error error)
 58 {
 59     auto exception = errorToException(error);
 60     if (context)
 61         context->addConsoleMessage(MessageSource::JS, MessageLevel::Error, makeString("Cache API operation failed: ", exception.message()));
 62     return exception;
 63 }
 64 
 65 static inline bool matchURLs(const ResourceRequest& request, const URL& cachedURL, const CacheQueryOptions& options)
 66 {
 67     ASSERT(options.ignoreMethod || request.httpMethod() == "GET");
 68 
 69     URL requestURL = request.url();
 70     URL cachedRequestURL = cachedURL;
 71 
 72     if (options.ignoreSearch) {
 73         if (requestURL.hasQuery())
 74             requestURL.setQuery({ });
 75         if (cachedRequestURL.hasQuery())
 76             cachedRequestURL.setQuery({ });
 77     }
 78     return equalIgnoringFragmentIdentifier(requestURL, cachedRequestURL);
 79 }

 27 #include "config.h"
 28 #include "DOMCacheEngine.h"
 29 
 30 #include "CacheQueryOptions.h"
 31 #include "Exception.h"
 32 #include "HTTPParsers.h"
 33 #include "ScriptExecutionContext.h"
 34 
 35 namespace WebCore {
 36 
 37 namespace DOMCacheEngine {
 38 
 39 Exception convertToException(Error error)
 40 {
 41     switch (error) {
 42     case Error::NotImplemented:
 43         return Exception { NotSupportedError, "Not implemented"_s };
 44     case Error::ReadDisk:
 45         return Exception { TypeError, "Failed reading data from the file system"_s };
 46     case Error::WriteDisk:
 47         return Exception { TypeError, "Failed writing data to the file system"_s };
 48     case Error::QuotaExceeded:
 49         return Exception { QuotaExceededError, "Quota exceeded"_s };
 50     case Error::Internal:
 51         return Exception { TypeError, "Internal error"_s };
 52     case Error::Stopped:
 53         return Exception { TypeError, "Context is stopped"_s };

 54     }
 55     ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
 56     return Exception { TypeError, "Connection stopped"_s };
 57 }
 58 
 59 Exception convertToExceptionAndLog(ScriptExecutionContext* context, Error error)
 60 {
 61     auto exception = convertToException(error);
 62     if (context)
 63         context->addConsoleMessage(MessageSource::JS, MessageLevel::Error, makeString("Cache API operation failed: ", exception.message()));
 64     return exception;
 65 }
 66 
 67 static inline bool matchURLs(const ResourceRequest& request, const URL& cachedURL, const CacheQueryOptions& options)
 68 {
 69     ASSERT(options.ignoreMethod || request.httpMethod() == "GET");
 70 
 71     URL requestURL = request.url();
 72     URL cachedRequestURL = cachedURL;
 73 
 74     if (options.ignoreSearch) {
 75         if (requestURL.hasQuery())
 76             requestURL.setQuery({ });
 77         if (cachedRequestURL.hasQuery())
 78             cachedRequestURL.setQuery({ });
 79     }
 80     return equalIgnoringFragmentIdentifier(requestURL, cachedRequestURL);
 81 }
